ooC: CR sounds a bout right. =p

-- Megatron --

Megatron smiles deviously at the demonstration. "Interesting, what 
cures this... poison?" He monitors Waspinator's condition as the 
poison. "This would be a useful weapon for infiltration purposes. 
Make sure information doesn't leak out, if the Maximals found out 
about it, they may be able to devise a counter-poison."

Megatron begins to say more when Warhead's comm interupts 
him. "Alright Warhead." He turns back to Perceptor and the stasis 
lock'd Waspinator, "Perceptor, bring his sorry ass back, he still 
has his uses. After that, head down to the storage bay, Switchblade 
has some further work that needs to be completed soon." Then he 
leaves the room, and heads for the CR chambers.
